title: The Last Architect gives you a quest for a Decor Treasure Hunt every day. Here are the solutions to his maddening riddles.
description: The Last Architect’s daily quest Decor Treasure Hunt is a great source for decor for your Player Housing. This neighborhood NPC presents you with one of several dozen riddles every day, though it’s not clear whether these will recur eventually, like Daily Que…
